# This is the output of crontab -l on production and preview
# It reindexes the Solr fulltext database every 24 hours
# at 7am UTC = midnight PST

# DO NOT EDIT THIS FILE - edit the master and reinstall.
# (/tmp/crontab.XXXX2bwTqE installed on Sun Jul 14 12:21:57 2013)
# (Cron version V5.0 -- $Id: crontab.c,v 1.12 2004/01/23 18:56:42 vixie Exp $)
0 7 * * * cd /data/antcat/current && echo y | RAILS_ENV=production bundle exec rake sunspot:reindex
